statements: SELECT * FROM payment_gateway;
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM payment_gateway;
SELECT card_number, card_expiry_date, security_code FROM payment_gateway;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, customer_id FROM payment_gateway ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateway WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateway WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM payment_gateway WHERE card_expiry_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, card_expiry_date FROM payment_gateway WHERE security_code = '123';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateway ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_id) AS max_transaction_id FROM payment_gateway;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, amount FROM payments WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_method FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, card_number FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_method, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Successful' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY payment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentUsers;
SELECT name, email FROM PaymentUsers;
SELECT user_id, name, registration_date FROM PaymentUsers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM Transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM PaymentUsers;
SELECT name, email FROM PaymentUsers WHERE registration_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT p.name, c.card_number FROM PaymentUsers p JOIN PaymentCards c ON p.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT t.amount, p.name FROM Transactions t JOIN PaymentUsers p ON t.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT p.name, c.card_number FROM PaymentUsers p LEFT JOIN PaymentCards c ON p.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, method_type FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail%';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, total_amount FROM users INNER JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id;
SELECT user_id, method_type FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY method_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS payment_count FROM payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT t.status, t.description, p.amount FROM transactions t JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id;
SELECT u.username, c.card_number, c.expiration_date FROM users u JOIN cards c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
